[Marginal note] Among two or three packs there can always be a black piece included, being black cotton.

These cloths must all have small calico-lists, with the arms of Leyden on the fringe. Above all, they must not be stained, should be well-pressed and not obviously stretched, of 55 to 60 ells length, as one pays freight and consulage duty per piece, for your guidance.
